general.header1: Pick ingredients you want to cook with

recipePage.tip: Tip! Click on ingredient to see substitutes

survey.consentHeder: Help us train the recipe AI
survey.consentText: We use statistical cookies to gather anonymised data in order to improve the recipe results. Check our cookie policy.
survey.npsQuestion: How likely are you to recommend this tool to a friend or colleague?
survey.whatGood: Great! What did you like about this tool?
survey.trackExplain: We track statistical data on your selections of the following: ingredients, recipes and filters (such as diets or cuisine)
